text: Factor the left-hand side of the equation to produce 3(t - 2)(t - 4) $$=$$ $$0$$.

title: Simplifying the Equation
text: When solving for $$t$$, we can simplify the equation 3(t - 2)(t - 4) $$=$$ $$0$$ to get $$t$$ - $$2$$ $$=$$ $$0$$ and $$t$$ - $$4$$ $$=$$ $$0$$ by dividing by $$3$$ on both sides.

title: Final Answer
text: We find that the particle is at rest at $$t$$ $$=$$ $$2$$ and $$t$$ $$=$$ $$4$$. Thus, your answer should be "2,4".
